name: part_010
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】Calliope Mori's First 3D Birthday Concert! #calli3DBD [hrcZEjdrkRg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Mori Calliope promotes her Major 1st EP 'SHINGAMI NOTE' and details the first-press limited edition contents.
Mori Calliope announces her first solo concert at Toyosu Pit and mentions the live stream for overseas fans.
Mori Calliope introduces the next song, 'end of a life', explaining its meaning and her career transition.
Mori Calliope performs 'end of a life'.

subtitles.original: QR code right now to pre-order
subtitles.english: QR code right now to pre-order

subtitles.original: it's going to be released on July 20th
subtitles.english: it's going to be released on July 20th

subtitles.original: July 20th, July 20th
subtitles.english: July 20th, July 20th

subtitles.original: and that will include 'Capsule'. By the way, 'Capsule's art was illustrated by Nardack.
subtitles.english: and that will include 'Capsule'. By the way, 'Capsule's art was illustrated by Nardack.

subtitles.original: So let's give a big ups to Nardack as well.
subtitles.english: So let's give a big ups to Nardack as well.

subtitles.original: But if you guys want to pre-order and I recommend you pre-order cause you get some cool stuff
subtitles.english: But if you guys want to pre-order and I recommend you pre-order cause you get some cool stuff

subtitles.original: you can scan the QR code right now.
subtitles.english: you can scan the QR code right now.

subtitles.original: 次に行きます。Next slide.
subtitles.english: Going to the next. Next slide.

subtitles.original: Because if you order the first press limited edition,
subtitles.english: Because if you order the first press limited edition,

subtitles.original: you get the LP-sized set, which is a CD plus DVD plus extras.
subtitles.english: you get the LP-sized set, which is a CD plus DVD plus extras.

subtitles.original: It's LP-sized but it's not a record, it's just like the size of a record,
subtitles.english: It's LP-sized but it's not a record, it's just like the size of a record,

subtitles.original: but it's got the CD in it, the Shinigami Note EP CD,
subtitles.english: but it's got the CD in it, the Shinigami Note EP CD,

subtitles.original: as well as five original LP-sized cover jackets drawn by various artists.
subtitles.english: as well as five original LP-sized cover jackets drawn by various artists.

subtitles.original: You guys are going to love these art pieces, they're so cool.
subtitles.english: You guys are going to love these art pieces, they're so cool.

subtitles.original: And then I also will be doing an interview, 30 minutes, on DVD,
subtitles.english: And then I also will be doing an interview, 30 minutes, on DVD,

subtitles.original: behind-the-scenes of the creation of the EP.
subtitles.english: behind-the-scenes of the creation of the EP.

subtitles.original: And then also you get a crest badge, honorary Dead Beat crest badge.
subtitles.english: And then also you get a crest badge, honorary Dead Beat crest badge.

subtitles.original: So yeah, that's pretty neat. But just so you guys know, these are super limited,
subtitles.english: So yeah, that's pretty neat. But just so you guys know, these are super limited,

subtitles.original: like we only have a certain amount of them,
subtitles.english: like we only have a certain amount of them,

subtitles.original: so if you want it, you may want to try and grab it before it's gone,
subtitles.english: so if you want it, you may want to try and grab it before it's gone,

subtitles.original: because these are not infinite and we are never making them again.
subtitles.english: because these are not infinite and we are never making them again.

subtitles.original: So you may want to grab these as soon as possible if you're interested.
subtitles.english: So you may want to grab these as soon as possible if you're interested.

subtitles.original: And then we've got the standard version of course including the same songs,
subtitles.english: And then we've got the standard version of course including the same songs,

subtitles.original: and then we have bonus items depending on each outlet that you use to buy the CD.
subtitles.english: and then we have bonus items depending on each outlet that you use to buy the CD.

subtitles.original: So you'll see those items pretty soon when the EP comes out.
subtitles.english: So you'll see those items pretty soon when the EP comes out.

subtitles.original: It's available for pre-order everywhere but you'll get little bonus items depending on which store you buy from.
subtitles.english: It's available for pre-order everywhere but you'll get little bonus items depending on which store you buy from.

subtitles.original: So again scan the QR code if you're interested. 次に行きます！Let's go to the next slide.
subtitles.english: So again scan the QR code if you're interested. Going to the next! Let's go to the next slide.

subtitles.original: And finally! My first solo concert, July 21st, 2022 at Toyosu Pit.
subtitles.english: And finally! My first solo concert, July 21st, 2022 at Toyosu Pit.

subtitles.original: That's the day after the EP drops. I want to see you guys there.
subtitles.english: That's the day after the EP drops. I want to see you guys there.

subtitles.original: More information coming soon but save the date.
subtitles.english: More information coming soon but save the date.

subtitles.original: And don't worry you guys if you're overseas and you can't get to Japan, no worries,
subtitles.english: And don't worry you guys if you're overseas and you can't get to Japan, no worries,

subtitles.original: because it will be streamed live to you and you will be able to buy a ticket for it.
subtitles.english: because it will be streamed live to you and you will be able to buy a ticket for it.

subtitles.original: So please don't worry about that, fans all over the world,
subtitles.english: So please don't worry about that, fans all over the world,

subtitles.original: you guys will get a chance to see it, so please anticipate it.
subtitles.english: you guys will get a chance to see it, so please anticipate it.

subtitles.original: We're working very hard on it and yeah I hope you'll have fun. That's all, 以上です。 That's all.
subtitles.english: We're working very hard on it and yeah I hope you'll have fun. That's all, that's all. That's all.

subtitles.original: So I figured the next song that I would sing would be...
subtitles.english: So I figured the next song that I would sing would be...

subtitles.original: sort of a celebration of moving on to the next.
subtitles.english: sort of a celebration of moving on to the next.

subtitles.original: I wrote this song to kind of come to terms with me moving on...
subtitles.english: I wrote this song to kind of come to terms with me moving on...

subtitles.original: ...from Japan's underground rap scene and embracing what I have found here in Holo.
subtitles.english: ...from Japan's underground rap scene and embracing what I have found here in Holo.

subtitles.original: And things won't change with me in terms of Holo,
subtitles.english: And things won't change with me in terms of Holo,

subtitles.original: I'll still stream for you guys and collab with my friends and do music collabs with them too.
subtitles.english: I'll still stream for you guys and collab with my friends and do music collabs with them too.

subtitles.original: But when it comes to my original music, Universal's going to be kind of with me throughout the journey.
subtitles.english: But when it comes to my original music, Universal's going to be kind of with me throughout the journey.

subtitles.original: So don't worry, I'm not leaving or anything. I'm still here.
subtitles.english: So don't worry, I'm not leaving or anything. I'm still here.

subtitles.original: But things maybe become a little more focused on the music.
subtitles.english: But things maybe become a little more focused on the music.

subtitles.original: Things might change a little bit, but again I don't want you to worry.
subtitles.english: Things might change a little bit, but again I don't want you to worry.

subtitles.original: I'm really excited about this, so let's rather try and celebrate together,
subtitles.english: I'm really excited about this, so let's rather try and celebrate together,

subtitles.original: looking towards a positive future with the next song, end of a life. Let's go.
subtitles.english: looking towards a positive future with the next song, end of a life. Let's go.

subtitles.original: We’d run right through those nights
subtitles.english: We’d run right through those nights

subtitles.original: I’ll never find my way back to you inside this labyrinth of lights
subtitles.english: I’ll never find my way back to you inside this labyrinth of lights

subtitles.original: There was madness in the meaning, never laughless, we were screaming
subtitles.english: There was madness in the meaning, never laughless, we were screaming

subtitles.original: At the top of our lungs to the numbingness This city never died
subtitles.english: At the top of our lungs to the numbingness This city never died

subtitles.original: I’ll fly no proof those heights
subtitles.english: I’ll fly no proof those heights

subtitles.original: I’ll never find another chance to say “thanks for saving my life”
subtitles.english: I’ll never find another chance to say “thanks for saving my life”

subtitles.original: I was hopeless, it was stinging, running roadless, we were singing
subtitles.english: I was hopeless, it was stinging, running roadless, we were singing

subtitles.original: At the top of our lungs to the numbingness This city never died
subtitles.english: At the top of our lungs to the numbingness This city never died

subtitles.original: What was the root of it all? I couldn't say
subtitles.english: What was the root of it all? I couldn't say

subtitles.original: Used to jump and then fall, well, getting cliché
subtitles.english: Used to jump and then fall, well, getting cliché

subtitles.original: We'd shrug it off without complaint, not a sound
subtitles.english: We'd shrug it off without complaint, not a sound

subtitles.original: No use in trying to find friends 'cause in the end nobody sticks around
subtitles.english: No use in trying to find friends 'cause in the end nobody sticks around

subtitles.original: It's when you shoved yourself into a crowded place
subtitles.english: It's when you shoved yourself into a crowded place

subtitles.original: That you turned around and found yourself in love and outer space
subtitles.english: That you turned around and found yourself in love and outer space

subtitles.original: Cue the reckless nights, no strings, laughing at our own dreams
subtitles.english: Cue the reckless nights, no strings, laughing at our own dreams

subtitles.original: Just what the hell was so funny?
subtitles.english: Just what the hell was so funny?

subtitles.original: Up the wrong tree, stumble, used to fall and grey heart
subtitles.english: Up the wrong tree, stumble, used to fall and grey heart

subtitles.original: Abyss to concrete jungle, singing 'cause it felt right
subtitles.english: Abyss to concrete jungle, singing 'cause it felt right

subtitles.original: We mixed the ennui and troubles rhyming art's intent
subtitles.english: We mixed the ennui and troubles rhyming art's intent

subtitles.original: And though it's history I can't forget the time we spent
subtitles.english: And though it's history I can't forget the time we spent

subtitles.original: Convinced that this could mean another end exists between real and pretend
subtitles.english: Convinced that this could mean another end exists between real and pretend

subtitles.original: A twisted ultra fiction where I missed my chance to not ascend
subtitles.english: A twisted ultra fiction where I missed my chance to not ascend

subtitles.original: Disappearing into the mist of “never happened”
subtitles.english: Disappearing into the mist of “never happened”

subtitles.original: Is it to me that I can never be a friend?
subtitles.english: Is it to me that I can never be a friend?

subtitles.original: I let it go
subtitles.english: I let it go

subtitles.original: Fade in, fade out, this crazy dream
subtitles.english: Fade in, fade out, this crazy dream

subtitles.original: Without a direction flowing aimlessly
subtitles.english: Without a direction flowing aimlessly

subtitles.original: There's nothing left back there for me
subtitles.english: There's nothing left back there for me
